==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Berat:''' Human eye can change the sea.
:{{DIcon}} Hello?
::'''Berat:''' Hear me out and don't keep staring at the sea.
::'''Berat:''' Otherwise, you'll just sit there and watch, unable to do anything else.
::'''Berat:''' Until the sky and the sea eventually turn red and everything perishes, including you...
::{{DIcon}} The purple seawater...
::'''Berat:''' Oh, you've seen the purple sea?
::'''Berat:''' A pair of more treacherous eyes must've been watching it then, too!
::'''Berat:''' Anyway, heed my warning...
::'''Berat:''' Do not stare at the sea.
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Berat:''' Remember what I told you.
{{Dialogue End}}
